H0.text: In 1919, which Dadaist created L.H.O.O.Q., a parody of the Mona Lisa, in which a moustache and goatee beard were added to a reproduction of the painting. Marcel Duchamp

H1.text: In 1919, which Dadaist created L.H.O.O.Q., a parody of the Mona Lisa, in which a moustache and goatee beard were added to a reproduction of the painting. Hugo Ball

H2.text: In 1919, which Dadaist created L.H.O.O.Q., a parody of the Mona Lisa, in which a moustache and goatee beard were added to a reproduction of the painting. Tristan Tzara

H3.text: In 1919, which Dadaist created L.H.O.O.Q., a parody of the Mona Lisa, in which a moustache and goatee beard were added to a reproduction of the painting. R.Mutt

A4.text: In 1919, Duchamp made a parody of the Mona Lisa by adorning a cheap reproduction of the painting with a mustache and goatee.

A5.text: To this he added the inscription L.H.O.O.Q., a phonetic game which, when read out loud in French quickly sounds like 'Elle a chaud au cul'.
